<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Teams

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a new AI task (subtask of parentTask). Type is name of registered task type.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> teamMember [[createTask]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[type, parentTask], priority, name1, value1, (...), nameN, valueN]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> teamMember: [[Team Member]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [type, parentTask]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - <tt>name</tt> defined in <tt>CfgTasks</tt>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> parentTask (optional): [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> priority: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> name1: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> value1: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Task]]
<comment><!--
|x1= <code>(example)</code>
-->
</comment>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Tasks]] [[type]] [[briefing]] [[createSimpleTask]] [[simpleTasks]] [[currentTask]] [[currentTasks]] [[setCurrentTask]] [[taskState]] [[setTaskState]] [[taskResult]] [[setTaskResult]] [[taskCompleted]] [[removeSimpleTask]]
</value></part></template>
